entry.title: Elevated errors on Claude models
entry.content:
Feb 4, 17:06 UTC
Resolved - The outage between 16:20 UTC / 8:20 PT and 16:55 UTC / 8:55 PT has now been resolved.

Feb 4, 16:53 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Feb 4, 16:39 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

entry.title: Elevated errors on Claude Opus 4.5 and Sonnet 4.5
entry.content:
Feb 4, 11:11 UTC
Resolved - The issue hs been fully resolved. The timelines are:

* 02:00 PT / 10:00 UTC to 02:35 PT / 10:35 UTC
* 02:54 PT / 10:54 UTC to 03:01 PT / 11:01 UTC

Feb 4, 11:05 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Feb 4, 10:59 UTC
Identified - The issue has just reocurred.

Feb 4, 10:40 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Feb 4, 10:37 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Feb 4, 10:18 UTC
Update - Sonnet 4.5 is also throwing errors.

Feb 4, 10:13 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

entry.title: Elevated error rate on API across all Claude models

Feb 3, 18:03 UTC
Resolved - This is a repeat of the earlier incident today. The incident started at 9:52 PT / 17:52 UTC and ended at 9:56 PT / 17:56 UTC. The percentage of requests impacted was also smaller.

Feb 3, 18:00 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

entry.title: Credit purchase issues & delays
entry.content:
Feb 2, 02:08 UTC
Resolved - The incident has been resolved

Feb 1, 23:47 UTC
Monitoring - Purchasing has been confirmed working regularly again, since around 2:30pm Pacific Time. Engineers are monitoring to ensure the system stays healthy.

Feb 1, 23:08 UTC
Identified - The root cause has been discovered and engineers are working on a fix

Feb 1, 21:59 UTC
Investigating - We've received reports that some customers who purchase API or Extra Usage credits are having issues purchasing, and some purchases charged successfully are resulting in significant delay until those customers see the updated credits.

Engineering is investigating.

entry.title: Elevated errors on Claude Sonnet 4.5

Feb 1, 11:48 UTC

Feb 1, 11:47 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

entry.title: Elevated errors on Claude Opus 4.5

Feb 1, 10:54 UTC

Feb 1, 10:54 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating an issue with Opus 4.5 that started at 2026-02-01 02:41 PT / 10:41 UTC.

entry.title: Some users are experiencing memory leaks in Claude Code 2.1.27
entry.content:
Jan 31, 21:06 UTC
Resolved - This incident has been resolved. Update Claude Code to 2.1.29.

Jan 31, 20:41 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jan 31, 20:18 UTC
Identified - We have identified the problem and are working on a fix. More details can be found in Github issue #22042.

entry.title: Some users are experiencing delays in purchasing additional API credits
entry.content:
Jan 29, 20:39 UTC
Resolved - During the outage, all of the following were delayed:
- customer balances
- billing for standard API usage
- issuing credit auto-recharge invoices
- access shutoff/restore for $0 in credits, and for reaching spend limits

The outage has now been resolved. There is no longer a system delay for any of the above.

Jan 29, 19:51 UTC
Identified - Some customers are experiencing delays in having their successful credit purchases applied and in triggering credit auto-reloads. We have identified the issue and are working to resolve.

Jan 29, 19:10 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating this issue.

Jan 28, 13:52 UTC

entry.title: Elevated errors: Invalid `signature` in `thinking` block
entry.content:
Jan 23, 07:47 UTC
Resolved - This issue is resolved for new requests. However, for responses from one platform received between 2026-01-23 00:00 UTC - 2026-01-23 08:00 UTC that are subsequently included in requests sent to a different platform, there may still be errors.

Jan 23, 07:32 UTC
Monitoring - A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.

Jan 23, 06:24 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Jan 23, 05:22 UTC
Update - A mitigation is to _not_ mix Claude API traffic between Bedrock, Vertex, and api.anthropic.com. Each platform is fully operational independently.

Jan 23, 05:12 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Jan 23, 05:10 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Jan 23, 05:09 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and fix is being implemented.
